## SyncStatePropConfig interface

Configuration for synchronized state property

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SyncStatePropConfig 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [idProp](./state-sync.syncstatepropconfig.idprop.md) | string | A property on state value that unqiuely identifies it. |
|  [type?](./state-sync.syncstatepropconfig.type.md) | "value" \| "array" | <i>(Optional)</i> Type of state data |
|  [wipeable?](./state-sync.syncstatepropconfig.wipeable.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Set to false if you wish to preserve values after wipes |
